# Cool


## Packages

* [`gghighlight`](https://yutannihilation.github.io/gghighlight/articles/gghighlight.html)
* [`ggannotate`](https://github.com/MattCowgill/ggannotate)
* Cool [summary statistics with `skimr`](https://github.com/ropensci/skimr)
* (`patchwork`) for combining plots and tables in R
Two vignettes: [Assembling plots](https://patchwork.data-imaginist.com/articles/assembly.html) and [Controlling layouts](https://patchwork.data-imaginist.com/articles/layout.html)
* [`anytime`](https://github.com/eddelbuettel/anytime) 
* [`parzer`](https://github.com/ropensci/parzer) parsing geographic coordinates
